byline.contributor: Al Baker and Stephanie Clifford contributed reporting, and Elisa Cho contributed research.

abstract: New York City Police Sergeant Joel Doseau is arrested for having sex with underage girl he met online in 2007; is suspended without pay and surrenders gun and badge; is released on $100,000 bond.
lead_paragraph: The sergeant, Joel Doseau, 43, was a arraigned on 40 counts, including charges of rape, sexual abuse, sexual misconduct and the use of a child in a sexual performance.

headline.main: Police Say Brooklyn Sergeant Had Sex With Underage Girl
headline.print_headline: Police Say Brooklyn Sergeant Had Sex With Underage Girl

snippet: The sergeant, Joel Doseau, 43, was a arraigned on 40 counts, including charges of rape, sexual abuse, sexual misconduct and the use of a child in a sexual performance.
